segments.text: Observing this, the kitchen looks warm and inviting at a glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's routine of drying dishes is almost soothing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I spot the faucet blasting water out of the sink!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's flooding the area, and she's clueless—unbelievable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Who leaves the water running like that? It's careless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's antics with the cookie jar are equally infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Climbing on that tipping stool— he's asking for trouble!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl encouraging him just adds to the recklessness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They should know better than to sneak around like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The pretty garden view makes the indoor disorder even more maddening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand watching potential disasters unfold ignored.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is testing my patience.
segments.speaker: PAR
